Hydras::

"Humm"hissed Hydras said to Azure while he cheking his comlink and 
his circuits"It seems that comunications are repaired and some 
really big it's comming,"after said that he opened his comlink to 
Wolfsteina and said"Wolfstein, REPORT!"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Wolfenstein grabbed the last reactor and put it in place while 
> Sharpclaw plugged the cables of the first two in the gun.
> 
> As Wolfenstein plugegd the last cable, the computer came online.
> 
> Computer: Circuits activation. Telemetry... online. Targetting... 
> online. Artillery... online. Retalian ready for battle.
> 
> Retalian, the super gun, was now ready. Dreadplague leaped right 
> next to the control panel and locked visually to the small 
satellite
> that the Minions had left.
> 
> Dreadplague: Retalian, confirm lock and fire! Destroy that 
slaggin' 
> scrap!
> 
> Retalian: Lock confirmed. Powering up... firing.
> 
> A powerful detonation rocked the crater and sent the transformers 
in 
> it falling down as Retalian recoiled nearly to the bottom of the 
> crater. The shot was mighty and savage.
> 
> In space, the satellite was utterly blow apart. Not even melting 
> remains were left.
> 
> Dreadplague: Yes! We've done it!
> 
> Immediatly, static confirmed that communications were back.
> 
> However, long range radars also detected something huge in the 
> Moon's orbit.
> 
> Unicron had arrived.
